title: UNDP-GICHD support for Mainstreaming Mine Action into the SDGs at the National Level in Bosnia-Herzegovina and Jordan
description: Building upon the UNDP-GICHD study ‘Leaving No One Behind: Mine Action and the SDGs’ and based on the needs for support expressed by several mine/ERW-affected countries, the objective of this joint UNDP-GICHD project is to support Bosnia and Herzegovina and Jordan in mainstreaming the SDGs into mine action.
